home.home.title: Welcome to Risk Reforged
home.home.text: A strategic game of conquest and diplomacy in Warcraft III

notfound.notfound.title: You've been mislead!
notfound.notfound.text: I'm sorry you've gone all this way for nothing

standalone.standalone.text: This is a showcase and a trailer for the game that is currently in development!

newsandevents.newsandevents.title: NEWS & EVENTS
newsandevents.newsandevents.nodata: Stay tuned for the latest news and upcoming events. Check back soon for updates!
newsandevents.newsandevents.flavourtext: Strategy begins with knowing when and where. Don't just play - command with foresight. Follow our community calender for livestreams, tournaments and all upcoming events.

newssection.newssection.title: NEWS
newssection.newssection.none: No news available at the moment.

watchus.watchus.description: Tune in our official YouTube and Twitch channels for weekly tournament streams packed with excitement and entertainment.

gameguide.gameguide.title: GAME GUIDE
gameguide.gameguide.subtitle: Learn the game
gameguide.gameguide.description: Explore our comprehensive game guide to master the art of strategy and tactics.
gameguide.gameguide.footer: Join the community for more tips and tricks
gameguide.gameguide.intro: Risk Reforged is a game about conquering cities and ports across Europe. Win conditions vary depending on what game mode has been chosen, but what is common among all modes is that you have to capture 60% of all cities.
gameguide.gameguide.followup: The following sections will help you familiarise yourself with the basic concepts and help you get on your way to dominate Europe in no time!
